QUESTION: I am light as a feather, but not even the strongest man can hold me for much longer than a minute. What am I? (Breath)
I am not alive, but I grow. I don't have lungs, but I need air. I don't have a mouth, but I need water to live. What am I? (Plant)
I am always in front of you, but can’t be seen. What am I?
I am taken from a mine, and shut up in a fortress, to be used when required. What am I?
I am tall when I am young, and short when I am old. What am I?
I am an odd number. Take away a letter, and I become even. What number am I?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch, will soon turn red. What am I?
I am an invention that saves time and space, though I am made of paper, I can hold an unlimited amount of data. What am I?
I am an essential component of every day, but often neglected and taken for granted. What am I?
I am not alive, but I can die. I don’t have a mouth, but I can be extinguished. What am I?
I am a type of bird that can swim, dive, and catch fish with its beak. What am I?
I am a type of animal that can change color to blend in with its surroundings. What am I? (Chameleon)
I am a type of tree that is famous for its ability to survive and grow in inhospitable environments. What am I? (Cactus)
I am a type of insect that can fly and feed on flowers. What am I? (Bee)
I am a type of animal that is known for its long neck and ability to reach high branches for food. What am I? (Giraffe)
I am a type of musical instrument that can be played with a bow. What am I? (Violin)
I am a type of animal that is known for its large size, intelligence, and use of tools. What am I? (Orangutan)
I am a type of plant that produces seeds in a pod. What am I? (Pea)
I am a type of bird that is known for its bright colors and beautiful song. What am I? (Canary)
I am a type of animal that is known for its striped fur and tendency to steal food. What am I? (Zebra)
I am a type of tree that is famous for its ability to survive in the harshest conditions. What am I? (Cedar)
I am a type of bird that is known for its beautiful feathers and impressive courtship dance. What am I? (Peacock)
